quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time. – George Bernard Shaw
fact: No matter where you stand in Michigan, you are never more than 85 miles from a Great Lake.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke:
How many seconds are in a year?
12.
January 2nd, February 2nd, March 2nd, April 2nd.... etc
